title: Research Engineer I (Autonomous Flight Controls)
description:
Key Responsibilities

The School of Mechanical & Aerospace Engineering (MAE) welcome applications for a Research Engineer position on Autonomous Flight Controls at the eVTOL Research and Innovation Centre located at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. The selected candidate will join a vibrant and dynamic research group, equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to work on the following:


Autonomous control framework development for an eVTOL platform.
Assist the teams in seamlessly integrating control algorithms into different hardware architectures.
Real-time implementation of control and path planning strategies on an eVTOL system.
Presentation of research progress, reports, and latest findings at regular intervals.


Job Requirements


Bachelor's Degree in the field of Electrical/ Mechanical/Aerospace Engineering with a major emphasis in the domain of Control, Automation, and/or Robotics.
Excellent knowledge of control programming involving Nonlinear Systems and Control theory, Machine Learning, and Neural Networks, and Model Predictive Control.
Sound coding skills in C/C++, MATLAB, Python.
Excellent knowledge in using Simulink.
Excellent knowledge in implementing control strategies of real-time multi-rotors.
Good English writing and communication skills as required by research work


We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

title: Software Developer (AI/Machine Learning Specialist)
description:
GoNetZero™ empowers clients worldwide to achieve their net-zero goals. As a global decarbonisation solution provider, it offers comprehensive end-to-end solutions through its digital platform and verified environmental attributes (EAs), including Renewable Energy Certificates and carbon credits. It is the carbon management business of Sembcorp Industries, a Singapore Stock Exchange-listed company.




GoNetZero™’s suite of digital solutions includes Measure – which enables clients to begin their net-zero journey by assessing their organisations’ emissions; Manage – which allows clients to view, manage, and retire their EAs portfolio seamlessly on a single platform; and Perform – which helps clients maximise the output and lifespan of their renewable energy assets across multiple sites on a single dashboard. Additionally, GoNetZero™ provides custom solutions tailored to clients’ decarbonisation needs.




Since its launch in 2022, GoNetZero™ has supported over 80 clients globally through its established offices in Singapore, the UK, and Vietnam




We are seeking a talented AI/Machine Learning Specialist to join our dynamic team. As an AI/Machine Learning Specialist, you will be responsible for developing, implementing, and deploying AI and machine learning solutions that solve complex business problems. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities and develop strategies aligned with business goals. This role requires a deep understanding of machine learning algorithms, programming skills, and the ability to evaluate and improve models continuously.

Responsibilities:

- Fine-tuning generative AI models
- Designing AI Agents
- Experimenting with new techniques for recommender systems
- Building and maintaining inference pipelines
- Managing deployment and model versioning pipelines
- Building tooling to continuously validate models in production
- Analyze large, complex datasets to extract insights and identify trends.
- Evaluate model performance and optimize models for scalability and efficiency.
- Stay current with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning.
- Communicate findings and results to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner.
- Work closely with software developers to integrate models into production systems.

Requirements:

- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or related field; Master’s or Ph.D. preferred.
- Proven experience (5-7 years) as an AI/Machine Learning Specialist or similar role.
- Experience working with transformer models, text embeddings and deploying and managing ML models in a production setting
- Familiarity with common NLP libraries: PyTorch, HuggingFace Transformers, SpaCy, etc.

title: Information Technology - Data Scientist (Data Science Track)
description:
Job Description

SIA has multiple positions for junior and senior data scientists to drive our AI, data science and business analytics initiatives.

Key Responsibilities Include


Member of an in-house AI and data science development team that works on AI (including areas in generative AI, autonomous agent, NLP, computer vision and recommender system), mathematical optimization, game theory, and experimental design.
Work closely with business stakeholders to create impactful and intelligent features/services in AI, data science and data analytics. Propose and build scalable ML/DL solutions. Deploy them as API microservices for use by software applications and business users for faster and more effective decision making.
Oversee the technical work of external technology partners and provide them datasets to deliver products/services in AI and data science. Support business users in the assessment/ validation of partner-supplied prediction models and in their deployment to production cloud.
Work closely with application development teams to operationalize and integrate AI/ML capabilities in API microservices.
Note: You could be posted to any subsidiary in SIA Group.


Requirements


BS in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Physics or related discipline is required. PhD and MS degrees related to machine learning and other AI disciplines are preferred.
Intermediate programming skills in Python. Conversant with algorithm design/analysis, data structure and SQL. Familiarity with functional/object-oriented software development using modern programming languages such as Scala, TypeScript/JavaScript, Java and C# is a plus.
Exposure in the use of workflow/map-reduce and stream processing systems such as Spark and Kafka for big-data processing.
Relevant internship or industry experience as a hands-on data scientist/AI engineer in shallow and/or deep learning (you should be very comfortable with most topics covered in the free undergraduate textbook by Gareth James, “An Introduction to Statistical Learning – with Applications in Python”, 2023). Additional exposure in some of the following areas is a plus:
Use of recent proprietary/open-source LLMs through prompt engineering (such as OpenAI ChatGPT and Bing Chat). Familiarity with LLM application/data frameworks (such as LlamaIndex and LangChain).
Experience of using GPU-accelerated deep learning frameworks (such as PyTorch and TensorFlow).
Familiarity with Bayesian statistics/inference and Bayesian/causal networks for probabilistic reasoning.
Some hands-on experience of AWS, Azure, GCP or other public cloud environment.
Good interpersonal and communication skills for working with both technical staff and non-technical business users.
Experience with Agile/Scrum/Kanban methodologies is a plus.

title: NLP Engineer (Gen AI)
description:
Keywords: NLP, AI, Machine Learning, Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Gen AI

Our client is on the hunt for a talented and experienced Natural Language Processing (NLP) Engineer. This role offers an exciting opportunity to apply your NLP knowledge in developing generative AI solutions, leveraging machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch. You'll be part of a team that values innovation, creativity, and inclusivity, working in a fast-paced environment where your contributions will have a significant impact.

Opportunity to work with cutting-edge NLP techniques and technologies
Inclusive and innovative work environment
Significant impact on generative AI solution development

What you'll do:

As an NLP Engineer, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of AI solutions. Your day-to-day responsibilities will involve working closely with subject matter experts, conducting independent research, engaging in data engineering tasks, assessing different NLP techniques, executing testing procedures on NLP models, keeping up-to-date with the latest advancements in the field, and documenting your findings. Your commitment to delivering optimal solutions efficiently will be key to your success.

Work closely with subject matter experts to incorporate NLP components into existing systems and applications.
Conduct independent research to refine and enhance product evaluation suites, ensuring accurate measurement of model and product performance.
Engage in various data engineering tasks, including data collection, preprocessing, quality control, and augmentation.
Assess and compare different NLP techniques and tools to pinpoint the most effective approach for specific tasks.
Execute thorough testing and validation procedures on NLP models.
Keep abreast of the latest advancements in NLP techniques and methodologies.
Exhibit a strong drive to deliver optimal solutions within tight timelines.
Comprehensive documentation of technical specifications, architectural designs, and best practices.

What you bring:

The ideal candidate for this role is someone who holds a Master's or Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field. You should have 2-5 years of hands-on experience in Gen AI solution development specifically in NLP applications. A strong understanding of NLP fundamentals, algorithms, and techniques is essential. Proficiency in Python and relevant NLP libraries, as well as experience with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow and PyTorch, is required. You should also have excellent problem-solving, communication, and teamwork skills. Experience with specific NLP tasks such as text classification, named entity recognition, sentiment analysis, or question answering is a plus.

Master or bachelor degree in computer science , AI / Machine Learning or related field.
2 - 5 years of hands-on experience in Gen AI solution development specific in NLP applications.
Strong understanding of NLP fundamentals, algorithms, and techniques.

Excellent problem-solving, communication, and teamwork skills.
Experience with specific NLP tasks such as text classification, named entity recognition, sentiment analysis, or question answering.
Knowledge of natural language understanding (NLU) and natural language generation (NLG).

title: Robotics Engineer
description:
Job Title: Robotics Software and Systems Engineers




Location: Singapore




About Nextwave Partners:

NextWave Partners is the Recruitment Partner of choice within the Clean Energy, Sustainable Infrastructure, ESG, Impact Investment, and Climate-Tech Technology sectors. We are committed to supporting industries battling climate change towards a net-zero future and a sustainable economy.




Position Overview:

A client of ours is actively hiring Robotics Software and Systems Engineers to join their growing team. These roles encompass a variety of specialties including Robotics Systems and Software Development, Software Quality Assurance, DevOps, Technical Writing, and IoT integrations. As a part of their team, you will collaborate closely with talented engineers to design, develop, test, and deploy cutting-edge systems and software, pushing the boundaries of Robotics automation.




Responsibilities:




• Analyze system architecture and make informed design decisions to optimize performance.

• Design and develop software solutions for robotic systems.

• Create detailed test plans and execute thorough testing procedures.

• Implement and refine algorithms for navigation, perception, and control.

• Collaborate with hardware engineers to integrate the software with sensing and actuation components.

• Conduct system-level testing and debugging to ensure robust performance.

• Optimize software for enhanced performance and reliability.

• Develop and maintain comprehensive engineering documentation including release documentation, user manuals, and service guides.

• Establish and maintain DevOps pipelines for continuous integration and deployment.

• Ensure software quality through rigorous verification and validation processes.

• Support deployment and troubleshooting efforts at customer sites in collaboration with field engineers.

• Assist in real-time issue diagnosis and resolution alongside field engineers.

• Develop and manage documentation systems to support engineering processes and knowledge sharing.




Qualifications:

We encourage candidates with at least 2 of the following areas to apply:




• Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Robotics, Electrical Engineering, or a related field.

• Experience in software development for robotic systems, including navigation, perception, and control algorithms.

• Proficiency with Python and/or C++ for embedded systems development.

• Strong familiarity with Linux operating systems.

• Hands-on experience with ROS (Robot Operating System) and RTOS (Real-Time Operating Systems).

• Background in designing and implementing IoT solution architectures and integrations.

• Skills in front-end, back-end, or full-stack development for web applications.

• Experience with hardware-software integration, especially in sensing and actuation.

• Knowledge of system-level testing and debugging techniques.

• Understanding of software optimization practices for performance and reliability.

• Familiarity with DevOps tools and practices such as Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes.

• Experience with continuous integration and deployment pipelines.

• Proficiency in verification and validation (V&V) processes.

• Strong technical writing abilities for creating detailed documentation.

• Effective communication skills and teamwork capabilities in fast-paced environments.

• Strong problem-solving skills and ability to thrive in dynamic work settings.




Application

If you are interested in this position, please apply directly on the platform with your latest CV. We will review your application and revert back promptly.

title: Senior Researcher, Natural Language Processing
description:
About LightSpeed

Lightspeed Studios are one of the world’s most innovative and successful game developers. We are expanding across China, the United States, Singapore, Canada, Japan, South Korea, and New Zealand.




Founded in 2008, LightSpeed Studios has created over 50 games across multiple platforms and genres for more than 4 billion registered users. It is the co-developer of worldwide hit PUBG MOBILE.




Job Responsibilities

Responsible for NLP research and development including Chinese word segmentation, part-of-speech tagging, sentence analysis, and named entity recognition.
Responsible for text classification, sentiment analysis, data mining, text generation, topic analysis, label extraction, and other research and development job.
Optimize existing online algorithms, develop efficient and reliable NLP solutions by combining business needs and data.
Explore applications of NLP techniques and deep learning algorithms in games.
Follow the latest developments in academia and industry and quickly apply findings in your work.




Job Requirements

Familiar with NLP fundamentals, with a strong understanding of statistical models, related machine learning principles, and experience working on NLP related projects.
Proficient in at least one programming language, familiar with basic data structures and algorithms.
Experience in big data mining, knowledge-graph auto-making, and deep learning experience is preferred.
Familiar with word segmentation, part-of-speech tagging, entity recognition, sentence analysis, model pre-training. Experience in sentiment analysis, relationship extraction, and event extraction is preferred.
Publication of academic results in academic journals and conferences in NLP-related fields (such as: EMNLP, ACL) is preferred.
Familiar with CRF, SVM, and other classic machine learning algorithms and tools, word vectors, RNN, CNN, LSTM, GAN, and other deep learning experiences are preferred.

title: Information Technology - Senior Data Scientist (Advanced AI Track)
description:
Job Description

SIA has multiple positions for generative AI/deep learning experts to drive our AI and data science initiatives.

Key Responsibilities Include


Member of the in-house AI Center-of-Excellence team that works on challenging problems in advanced AI (including areas on generative multimodal AI, autonomous agent, NLP, computer vision, recommender system), mathematical optimization, game theory, and experimental design.
Research and develop advanced machine learning algorithms to meet complex product requirements. The scope includes defining hypotheses, executing necessary tests and experiments; evaluating, tuning and optimizing algorithms and methods; and having an eye towards cloud implementation ease, scalability, and robustness in a live customer facing production environment.
Provide technical direction and guidance to a small and highly skilled team of junior and senior data scientists embedded in Kanban data squads. These squads deliver products/services in generative AI, data science and data analytics to stakeholders in a large number of business units. Serve as a go-to technical expert in your area of AI expertise.
Work closely with business stakeholders to create impactful and intelligent features/products. Collaborate with other team members including data scientists, data engineers and data strategists. Strategic ownership of all critical end-to-end AI processes.
Administer/maintain performant cloud and on-premises GPU compute resources that train large ML models and provide inference API microservices in production.


Requirements


PhD degree related to computer science, machine learning or other AI disciplines is required (consideration will be given to exceptional candidates without advanced degrees).
Demonstrated intellectual firepower as a rapid problem-solver and tech lead.
Advanced programming skills in Python. Strong technical skills in algorithm design/analysis, data structure and SQL. At least intermediate-level mastery of functional/object-oriented software development using modern programming languages such as Scala, TypeScript/JavaScript, Java or C# is a must.
Hands-on proficiency in the use of workflow/map-reduce and stream processing systems such as Spark and Kafka for big-data processing.
3 or more years of relevant industry experience as a hands-on technical expert in shallow and deep machine learning, with additional specializations in most of the following areas:
Experience in the use of recent proprietary/open-source LLM APIs (such as OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic Claude 2, Google PaLM 2, or Meta LLaMA 2); software development skills involving multi-agents and prompt engineering using LLM application/data frameworks (such as LlamaIndex and LangChain).
Highly conversant with GPU-accelerated deep learning frameworks (such as PyTorch and TensorFlow).
Demonstrated ability in rapidly adapting, training and deploying state-of-the-art AI models or services in production based on the latest published research papers and open-source code.
Familiarity of Bayesian statistics/inference and Bayesian/causal networks for probabilistic reasoning.
Significant hands-on experience of AWS, Azure, GCP or other public cloud environment.
Excellent mentoring, interpersonal and communication skills for working with both technical staff and non-technical business users.
Experience with Agile/Scrum/Kanban methodologies is a plus.

title: Solution Expert Architect (Data & AI)
description:
Orange Business continues to grow in the APAC region and Orange Business’s Digital & Communications Services - Cloud is growing over 25% YoY. To fulfill the market demand, DCS - Cloud is expanding its team and is currently looking for a Cloud Solution Architect – Data & AI Expert to join the team in APAC. The role will have a focus on growing the DCS - Cloud business, with specific reference to the Cloud and Data/AI portfolio. The role will be supporting countries in APAC.




Orange Business aspires to help our customers achieve their own digital transformation, demonstrating the power of Cloud solutions and services. We are looking for a Cloud Solution Architect for Data & AI to drive high priority customer initiatives on the Cloud Platform in collaboration with customers and the Cloud field. This is a customer facing role, responsible for providing end-to-end technical guidance and expertise.




The ideal candidate will possess strong customer facing and pre-sales experience in architecting Data & AI on with public cloud solutions such as Azure, AWS, Alibaba Cloud, Huawei Cloud and GCP. The Solutions Architect will work as part of the regional cloud team, to meet with customers, and act as a subject-matter expert for this portfolio, and be responsible and accountable to propose, design and implement the best solution for the Customer.




Key Accountabilities

Provide technical expertise to assess the customers’ requirements, architect the most suitable techno-commercial solutions, and assisting the Sales/Pre-sales consultants with the development of proposals, quotations, and presentations.
Accountable for technical validation of solution(s) proposed to customers, including liaising with Orange Business back-end Engineering, Implementation and Operations teams.
Responsible for high-level and low-level design activities, including best practice recommendations on technologies and vendors.
Work with the wider APAC team to assist on opportunities which fall outside primary responsibilities where required.
Technical responsibilities include product/platform selection and sizing, solution design, multi-vendor integration and to facilitate product demonstrations and customer proof of concept engagements.
To build and develop relationships with account management teams in the APAC region to identify, define, and qualify cloud opportunities from the Target Market List (TML) and to ensure growth in target accounts.
Be responsible for supporting the accounts for the sale of Orange DCS-Cloud portfolio in the region. The portfolio will include Data & AI service, Consulting, Public Cloud, Private Cloud, Hybrid Cloud, and others in the future.
To support account management teams in defining the scope of solutions and creating compelling customer-specific propositions by creatively bundling our services capability and those available through third-party vendors along with other capabilities of Orange (Connectivity, Cybersecurity etc) where possible. Lead the development of the cloud technical solution and commercial proposals and be able to comprehensively present it to the Customers.
To work closely with Commercial Management to make sure all costs are captured correctly. Ensure the profitability of each submission and follow established processes for obtaining approvals prior to submission to the customer.
In support of Account Managers, proactively drive innovation and value-creation discussions/ engagements with customers by leveraging your industry knowledge and consultative selling skills to demonstrate the true business value of the Solution to the Customer.
Develop a strong relationship with the Global DCS-Cloud Business Units (Marketing, Product Development, etc.). Provide relevant input/feedback based on customer requirements. Engage the wider DCS-Cloud teams to help a generation of complex proposals.
Stay abreast of market developments, trends, competitors’ landscape, the market-based price for the Cloud Market in APAC.
Work with the DCS-Cloud Team to develop the Customer Value Propositions for the Cloud portfolio
Develop partnerships and work with our partner’s local sales team to identify new opportunities (AWS, Azure, GCP, Alibaba Cloud, Huawei Cloud, etc.). Manage pipeline with partners through regular business/pipeline review.
Identify and manage third parties within proposed solutions; position Orange as the solution integrator.
Implementation of pricing models that optimize value to the customer and profitability to Orange.
Maintain a high degree of knowledge for Orange Business products, services, and solutions sets that have integration/alignment with the area of expertise




Responsibilities

Work closely with Partners to create win-themes and solutions
Support sales team to achieve sales targets
Data & AI Leads Generation
Develop and implement go-to market plans
Negotiate partner and vendor pricing, better rebates, more incentives, and business development funds from vendors
Develop a pricing strategy with appropriate margins based on the solution
Work closely with the sales team to develop sales pitches, prepare proposals and qualify prospects
Be able to articulate the business outcomes and benefits with each solution
Increase visibility and awareness of DCS-Cloud Portfolio through partnerships with Hyperscalers and vendors (AWS, Microsoft, Google, Equinix, Huawei, Ali-Cloud)
Conduct partner and vendor collaboration activities
Able to sell and upsell Portfolio products
Understanding of prospect win theme, pricing, and discount strategies to complete sales conversion.
Support prospecting activities such as events, webinars, and meet-ups
Find prospects and provide solution quotations




Required Skills & Experience

More than 6 years of Cloud Solution Architect Experience
More than 3 years of Data & AI Experience
Have strong presentation and communication skills
Comfortable selling Cloud and Managed Services to C level executives
Self-motivated and driven to achieve goals
Strong verbal and written communications skills are essential
Excellent negotiation and influential skills to close opportunities
A track record of achieving assigned targets in a cloud business development role with a demonstrable strong technical background in the APAC region
Ability to work in conjunction with the Sales and Pre-Sales organizations.
Ability to manage different partners.
Experience in engagement with the Indirect channels would be a plus.
Knowledge of smart solutions and consultative selling.
Strong commitment to meeting deadlines & completing assigned duties (result oriented)
Demonstrated flexibility & willingness to learn new technologies, commercial models and initiatives.
Languages: English; Chinese will be a plus




Education, Qualifications, and Certifications

Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering or a related field.
Prior technical experience in the following products would be advantageous:

ü Cloud Migrations

ü Application Modernization

ü Amazon Web Services (Associate or Professional)

ü Microsoft Azure (Azure Solution Architect Expert)

ü Google Cloud Platform (Professional)

ü Alibaba Cloud (ACP)

ü Huawei Cloud (HCP)

ü VMWare vSphere (preferably VCP certified)

ü Network and Security (preferably CCNA certified)

ü Microsoft Technologies (Windows Server and 365)

ü Opensource knowledge includes OpenStack, chef, Ansible

ü DevOps and Infrastructure as Code




Breadth of technical experience and knowledge in foundational Data, foundational AI, architecture design, with depth / Subject Matter Expertise in one or more of the following
Deep domain expertise in one of the Data-specific areas, such as Azure SQL Data (IaaS/PaaS), deployments and migrations to the cloud, Open-source database deployments and migrations, Cloud Scale Analytics, Data Governance, etc. OR hands-on experience working with the respective products at the expert level
Experience creating Data & Analytics Proof of Concepts (PoC), Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) for customers that lead to production deployments
Competitive Landscape: Knowledge of key Data & Analytics platforms such as AWS, GCP, Snowflake, etc
Software development practices like DevOps and CI/CD tool chains (i.e., Jenkins, Azure Developer Services, GitHub) and container orchestration systems (i.e., Docker, Kubernetes, Cloud Foundry, Azure Kubernetes Service, GitHub)

title: Data Scientist
description:
Job Purpose

Join our innovative and forward-thinking team at Strides Digital. We are dedicated to pioneering advanced technological solutions that drive the future of intelligent transportation, sustainability and decarbonisation.

Responsibilities


Implement data pipelines, integrating diverse data sources, including structured and unstructured data to ensure seamless data flow and accessibility for analytical purposes
Perform data mining, processing, cleansing, and validation to ensure the integrity and accuracy of data used in the construction of analytical systems.
Conduct exploratory data analysis, apply statistical methods to identify trends, patterns, and outliers.
Create and maintain reports, dashboards and data visualization to present insights and key findings to empower clients and stakeholders with actionable information for informed decision-making.
Build and implement machine learning/predictive/optimization models to generate useful insights and make data-driven predictions.
Integrate models into systems and run simulations to test their effectiveness.
Engage in collaborative efforts with cross-functional implementation teams to formulate and convert problems into actionable insights with high impact, covering diverse core business areas.
Identify and propose innovative uses of data to enhance company offerings and solve industry challenges.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve data science capabilities.



Qualifications & Work Experience


Proficiency in conducting exploratory data analysis, identifying patterns, and deriving insights using statistical techniques.
Ability to work with large datasets, ensuring accuracy and attention to detail in data analysis and interpretation.
Understanding of statistical concepts, and experience in building and implementing machine learning/predictive/optimization models.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills to effectively convey analysis results and collaborate with team members and stakeholders.
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.



Skills


Bachelor's degree or Postgraduate degree in Data Analytics, Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence or equivalent qualifications.
Proficient in at least one of the following programming skills: Python, SQL.
Strong knowledge of data visualization tools (e.g.Tableau, PowerBI, matplotlib or other python graphing libraries etc) to present data findings in a visually appealing and informative manner.
Candidates should ideally have 2-3 years of experience; however, fresh graduates with a strong academic background and relevant skills are also encouraged to apply.



Strides Digital is a leading provider of integrated digital solutions, driven by our core values of seamless, smarter, and sustainable. With a deep understanding of the constantly evolving digital landscape, we are here to cater to your unique business needs, ensuring that our solutions seamlessly integrate into your existing systems and processes.

title: Algorithm Engineer, TikTok e-Commerce
description:
TikTok will be prioritizing applicants who have a current right to work in Singapore, and do not require TikTok's sponsorship of a visa.

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us

Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.

Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.

To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.

At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.

Join us.

About The Team

The E-commerce Global Supply Chain and Logistics team is dedicated to enhancing clients' shopping experience and reducing logistics operational cost in TikTok E-commerce. We are currently looking for talented software engineers that have a deep understanding of machine learning (ML), operations research (OR), data mining and statistical inference.

Responsibilities


Participate in the construction of the full-link intelligent system of ByteDance e-commerce supply chains, and be responsible for business-oriented data mining and continuous iteration of algorithms.
Combined with massive e-commerce information, through data mining and machine learning, predict the performance of products in traffic/conversion throughout the whole lifespan, improve the efficiency of product operation, and assist in optimizing traffic distribution, to satisfy the requirements of product growth, hero product incubation, content-based product operation and some other scenarios.
Participate in the full process operation of inventory, investment attraction, product selection, and placement in key channels, activities and mega campaigns, and provide algorithm suggestions from the dimensions of selecting sellers and products.
Explore the impact mechanism of products on user behavior, and meet the business needs of increasing new customer acquisition, repurchase rate, and active user numbers through product selection strategies.


Qualifications


Master's or PhD degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Operations Research or related fields.
Familiar with at least one of the machine learning/deep learning/casual inference, with at least 1 year of relevant experience.
Proficient in one or more languages such as Python/Java, able to abstract problems and model optimization independently, familiar with big data processing technologies such as Spark/Hadoop/Hive.
Proficient in SQL language
Self-confidence, initiative and communication. Be able to take the initiative to deeply understand business and adapt to rapid business changes, have good personal expression and organizational communication skills, and be able to push things forward.


Preferred Qualifications


Work experience in e-commerce, supply chain, logistics, transportation or related fields is preferred.
Publications at KDD,NeurIPS,WWW,SIGIR,WSDM,CIKM,ICLR,ICML,IJCAI,AAAI and related conferences.


TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

title: Research Engineer I (Computer Vision - POSE Estimation)
description:
The Early Mental Potential & Wellbeing Research Centre's mission is to maximise every child's mental and emotional capital by uplifting neurodevelopmental trajectories during early sensitive periods through interdisciplinary discovery science and translational technologies.

Toward this aim, we engage in 3 major activities and thrusts:


Core Discovery Research, Empowering Science: Basic neuroscience research and advanced computational models to understand individual neurocognitive potential, developmental trajectories, and risk and resilience factors;
Translation to Clinic & Pedagogy, Empowering Practitioners: Developing precision assessment and intervention tools to optimise parent-child social and mental health within clinical, education and community settings;
Translation to Real-World Technologies, Empowering Families: Creating scalable solutions and real-world technologies for parents to enhance their child's mental and cognitive wellbeing at home.


We are looking for a Computer Vision (Pose Estimation) engineer reporting to PI - Professor Victoria Leong, Assistant Professor Liu Ziwei and research teams on developing a fully automated end-to-end ML algorithm to estimate pose in dyadic sociometric measurements during parent-child interactions. This is a research collaboration aimed at yielding a larger data pipeline to predict trajectories for early childhood development.

Key Responsibilities


Designing, implementing, and optimizing pose estimation algorithms for various applications within our technology stack.
Collaborating with hardware and software teams to integrate computer vision solutions into real-world systems.
Conducting research to stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in computer vision and pose estimation.
Analysing and enhancing the performance of existing pose estimation models through iterative testing and optimization.
Working closely with data scientists and machine learning engineers to develop and train models using diverse datasets.
Collaborating with the product team to understand and define the requirements for new features and functionalities related to pose estimation.


Job Requirements


Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Electronics Engineering or equivalent.
Strong background in machine learning and computer vision.
Solid programming skills in languages such as Python, C++, or similar languages.
Proficiency in using popular computer vision libraries and frameworks such as OpenCV, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, etc.
Strong understanding of 3D geometry, image processing, and machine learning techniques.
Experience with integrating computer vision solutions into real-world applications and systems.
Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced and innovative environment.
Good command of English, both oral and written along with the ability to communicate effectively with a wide range of individual and professional groups.
Proven work experience in 2D and 3D pose estimation, 3D pose recreation, and multiple camera system experience.
Familiarity with GPU programming and parallel computing for efficient algorithm implementation.
Research experience in relevant areas would be desirable (preferably worked in R&D sector with industrial experience in the project-related field).
Ability to work with limited supervision and work collaboratively in a multidisciplinary team.
Ability and willingness to work some flexible hours.
Experience of working in a fast-paced commercial / industry setting is desirable.


Candidates with a proven track-record in one or more of these areas are welcome to apply. We will begin reviewing applications from Aug/Sep2024 onwards, until the position is filled, and regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Hiring Institution: NTU

title: Expert, Data Scientist
description:
Exyte is a global leader in the design, engineering, and delivery of facilities for high-tech industries. With a history of more than 100 years, we have developed a unique expertise in controlled and regulated environments. Exyte has a truly global footprint, serving the most technically demanding clients in markets such as semiconductors, batteries, pharmaceuticals, biotechnology, and data centers. We offer a full range of services from consulting to the managing of turnkey solutions – delivered to the highest quality and safety standards. Solving the most complex challenges, Exyte forges trusted, long-lasting relationships with its clients. In 2019, Exyte generated sales of EUR 3.9 billion with around 5,200 highly experienced and motivated employees. The company is ideally positioned to further strengthen its market leadership with its broad industry insight and its exceptional talents.




We are currently on the lookout for an Expert, Data Scientist.




Role Purpose

The Data Scientist position will equip the global Procurement & Subcontracting Management (PSM) teams with key insights to address business challenges and inform commercial strategies.




The successful candidate will develop a full end to end reporting suite from conception to a companywide published product. Reports and analysis include but are not limited to; enhancing our global ERP procurement reports, procurement analysis of multibillion-dollar projects, tracking procurement metrics (P2P and progress reports) and linking commercial cost drivers to external market factors to forecast critical financial business impacts.




Responsibilities:

Conceptualize and design a holistic procurement data strategy to inform key business decisions. Design and own a project plan to successfully execute.
Responsible for all data engineering and data governance requirements for procurement globally.
Design & build databases to cleanse, normalize and compile complex data from multiple sources for BI reporting, preparing procurement to leverage and execute future AI/ ML opportunities.
Design and build Power BI reports to provide the business with advanced procurement analytics & insights. Develop a quarterly business report to inform global leadership teams of key business trends/ impacts across all reported metrics & reports.
Investigate where AI/ ML opportunities will add value and implement accordingly.
Conduct data analysis to identify trends and insights related to procurement processes and expenditures.
Develop and maintain reports, dashboards and data visualizations to support data-driven decision making.
Utilize statistical methods and data modelling techniques to analyse complex datasets, advancing with AI/ ML once foundations are established.
Implement and maintain data quality standards to ensure accuracy and reliability of reports.
Continuously improve data analysis processes and contribute to the enhancement of data analytics capabilities within Exyte.
Hosting routine project meetings with key stakeholders
Assisting PSM teams with digitalization of forms & templates, integrating with data repositories and reporting
Devise algorithms to generate models to generate insights and for predictive analysis




Requirements:

Minimum 7 years relevant work experience in data strategy, database design, report development & advanced business analytics
Proficiency with data mining, mathematics, and statistical analysis
Degree in Computer Science or relevant discipline
Experience in Power BI (Dax), Power Query (M), data architecture design, MS SQL and Azure SQL, Microsoft suite (SharePoint, Power Apps, Excel, Word, PowerPoint) is essential.
Experience in the use of one or more current analytical / big data technologies such as Python (including relevant libraries), Azure (Machine Learning, Stream Analytics, Data Factories etc.), Spark is advantageous.
History of solving business challenges using data driven solutions for a large complex organization
Track record of managing projects from concept design to completion

title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
description:
I am looking for senior level ML Engineer with a blend of engineering and applied research experience to assist in the development of our foundational logical reasoning AI system.




You will stand out if you are available immediately or have 1 month or less of notice period and the following technical experience in:

Large scale model training, multi-GPU training,
Training large models with over 20B parameters
Deep theoretical understanding of the transformers design and implementation.

Development of autonomous software development




Key Responsibilities

Work on Large Language Models to support the development of the foundational AI research
Design, develop, deploy, and evaluate novel machine learning models and algorithms to address theorem proving as a foundation for developing logical reasoning in AI.
Apply various ML techniques, including supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
Work with large datasets to preprocess, clean, and transform data for model training and evaluation.
Implement data pipelines and ETL processes to ensure efficient data flow and accessibility.
Design and conduct experiments, analyze results, develop metrics and benchmarks, and optimize the performance of machine learning models.




Experience & Qualifications:

Master’s or Ph.D. in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field.
5+ years in machine learning, AI, or related fields.
Proven experience with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.
Experience with deep learning architectures and techniques across various domains, including vision, natural language, and graphs; a bonus for experience with other neural network architectures (e.g., symbolic, GraphML).
Experience with program/code synthesis or models focused on systems design generation.
Experience applying ML to various real-world and engineering use cases.

title: Junior Software Engineer
description:
About Capgemini :-

Capgemini is a global leader in consulting, digital transformation, technology and engineering services. The Group is at the forefront of innovation to address the entire breadth of clients’ opportunities in the evolving world of cloud, digital and platforms. Building on its strong 50-years+ heritage and deep industry-specific expertise, Capgemini enables organizations to realize their business ambitions through an array of services from strategy to operations. Capgemini is driven by the conviction that the business value of technology comes from and through people. Today, it is a multicultural company with 360,000+ team members in almost 50+ countries. The Group reported in 2022 combined revenues of €22billion.

Capgemini's looking for next-gen tech talent in Singapore! Interested in bridging the gap between vision & reality with code?

Role- Junior Software Engineer (Next Generation Talent)

Location - Marina Bay Financial Centre, Singapore

Do you thrive on bringing ideas to life through code? Imagine collaborating with diverse stakeholders to grasp complex business needs and translating them into elegant software solutions. This role offers you the chance to make a real impact through the power of technology.

What You'll Do:

· Bridge the Gap: Unravel business requirements and translate them into clear technical specifications.

· Craft with Precision: Develop and refine software applications, ensuring exceptional functionality and performance.

· Maintain & Optimize: Nurture existing applications, keeping them efficient and secure.

· Test with Confidence: Execute rigorous testing across all levels, guaranteeing reliability and usability.

· Automate for Success: Streamline deployments with configuration management and automation tools.

· Innovate & Improve: Continuously identify opportunities to enhance systems and user experience.

What You Bring:

· Solid Foundation: A Computer Science or related Engineering degree equips you with the technical prowess.

· Sharp & Eager: Recent graduate or up to 2 years of hands-on experience showcase your agility.

· Frontend Expertise: Master the art of user interfaces with frameworks like HTML5, Angular, or React JS.

· Backend Powerhouse: Command backend languages like Java, .NET, Python, or PHP.

· Data Adeptness: Database proficiency is a valuable bonus.

· Full-Stack Potential: Experience in both frontend and backend development gives you an edge.

· Cloud Enthusiast: Familiarity with Cloud Platforms- AWS, Azure, GCP would be additional asset.

Ready to develop, refine software, collaborate with diverse teams, & make a real impact.? Join our team and make a meaningful impact!

Let's talk about what's in it for you!

Passionate people are Capgemini's Ace of Spades - join us to discover a career that will challenge, support and inspire you. Working at Capgemini you'll find the rewards are more than just financial. You will work alongside some very smart and inspiring people on exciting projects and you will also enjoy incredible benefits. We offer flexible work practices and 40 hours of self-development every year with a huge selection of learning opportunities to choose from.

As "Architects of Positive Futures", Capgemini actively supports the community in 3 ways:

Diversity and Inclusion - we believe diversity of thought fuels excellence and innovation, which is why we positively encourage applications from suitably qualified candidates regardless of their gender identity, ethnicity, sexual orientation, religion, ability, intersex status or age. To support our commitment to diversity and inclusion, we celebrate special events and days of significance that are important to our employees such as Diwali, Bastille Day, Pride, IDAHOBIT, IWD and International day of people with Disabilities. Our Employee Resource Groups Women@Capgemini and OutFront support the grassroots passion of employees to drive our diversity agenda and effect change.

Digital inclusion - at Capgemini we are using our skills to drive social impact initiatives focusing on helping society address the impact of the digital and automation revolution. We also provide employees with opportunities to give back to the community through charity projects and volunteer days.

Environmental Sustainability - Capgemini joined the CDP's (Carbon Disclosure Project) prestigious "A list" for its commitment to the Net-Zero economy. We are focusing on helping our clients transform towards more sustainable business models and committing to reduce our own carbon emissions (GHG) by 20% per employee by 2020.

Recognized by Ethisphere as one of the World's Most Ethical Companies for the last 8 years in a row, ethics and values are at the heart of Capgemini's corporate culture and business. Embedded in our DNA, our seven values - Honesty, Boldness, Trust, Team Spirit, Freedom, Fun and Modesty - have remained the same since company inception in 1967. To see how we bring these values to life, click here to listen to some of our employee’s stories.

Come join us, bring your whole self to work, create new possibilities for you, your customers and your community and help us to be Architects of Positive Futures.

title: Subject Matter Expert - AI
description:
The Subject Matter Expert supports the office of the CTO by being an expert primarily in the field of Artificial Intelligence, and in the other Key Technology areas of Compute, Network, Data & Security and Converging Technologies.




Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate with Global SME team on KTAs and provide regional insights
Understand the emerging technology coming from 5KTAs (with AI focus), collaborate with customers and SME members on Proof of Concepts and MVPs involving the 5 KTAs
Active involvement in working with Fujitsu Data and AI team in setting up of the AI CoE
Work closely with research institutes on core technology areas to be updated on the latest road map and technical information including technology/ solution demonstration tools
Knowledge sharing of information related to the 5 KTAs




Key Accountabilities

Customer Relationships. Identify customers for MVPs and work closely with them in facilitating proof of concepts and proof of values involving our 5 KTAs
Collaboration with partners. Engage with the alliance team to work with key partners on offerings/key technology
Influence. Influence our stake holders on technology decisions involving the 5 KTAs
Thought leadership. Provide industry insights involving core technology. Represent Fujitsu APAC as a subject matter expert on KTAs and participate in conferences, technology, partner and industry events.
Academia and Research institutes. Work with Academia and research institutes on future opportunities/ideas
Co-creation. Facilitate and co-create solutions with customers where applicable
Collaboration. Act as the liaison between regional teams and global teams




Key Performance Indicators

Works with Heads of Industries, and sales executives to identify customers who can participate in MVPs and Proof of Concepts
Develops and delivers original presentations and “white papers” on our KTAs
Represent APAC in global SME forums to provide regional insight and market feedback to Fujitsu HQ by attending various GTM (Go to Market) and development forums and meetings.
Represent Fujitsu in a number of events and conferences
Share information regarding the KTAs to our stake holders
Work successfully with our customers on MVPs and Proof of concepts
Hands on planning and implementation of PoC environment; and solve technical challenges




Desired Experience, Knowledge & Attributes

Bachelor’s degree or preferably Master’s degree in IT, Computer Science, MBA or any other related fields
Has Team Leader, Architecture and/or Consulting experience with broader business experience
Proven track record in architecture, leading to sales, consulting and delivery outcomes
At least 5-7 years of experience in selling or implementing Data Analytics, Business Intelligent or Data Warehouse solutions
Data analytics related skills is a must (SQL, R or Python-Statistical Programming, data visualization, machine learning)
Deep Learning Programming knowledge preferred,
Latest knowledge on the recent AI technology trend including Vision AI and Generative AI
Has a good level of understanding on the nominated Technology focus areas
Typically has extensive Technical Consulting and Advisory experience
Capable of speaking at conferences and media events
Strong ability to provide well-conceived, clearly articulated, pragmatic solutions and recommendations to complex infrastructure and application problems
Contributes to the knowledge base of Fujitsu within and beyond the Partner Aligned Practices
Ability to lead conversations and represent the Office of the CTO on all things related to the 5 KTAs
Experience in project and professional services pre-sales
Experience in developing proposals, pricing solutions, and negotiating with customers
Experience in formal design either as architect or in a senior technical or consulting role
Regular community interaction with internal and external event participation for Technology Advisory

title: Algorithm Engineer (Computer Vision), TikTok e-Commerce
description:
Responsibilities

TikTok will be prioritizing applicants who have a current right to work in Singapore, and do not require TikTok's sponsorship of a visa.

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us

Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.

Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.

To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.

At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.

Join us.

The team use the most advanced AI technology to combat various risks/violations in Bytedance's e-commerce platform, maintain platform security, build a good e-commerce ecosystem, and empower business teams to improve work efficiency. We pursue the ultimate risk detection capability. The fairness and sustainability of the e-commerce ecosystem, high-quality content and merchandise are areas where we are constantly striving for improvement.


Responsible for the optimization and iteration of computer vision related models in the e-commerce scene, including fine grain classification, Product object recognition, Product subject recognition, feature extraction, logo detection, brand recognition, etc., to optimize the merchant's product loading and unloading process.
Responsible for e-commerce short video and livestream classification, multi-modal content mining, multi-modal content understanding, optimize e-commerce short video and livestream shopping experience.
Responsible for e-commerce image search, photo search goods, goods duplication algorithm.
Explore the cutting-edge technology of computer vision, responsible for the iteration and evolution of the overall algorithm and system.
Support the production of scalable and optimised AI/machine learning (ML) models
Focus on building algorithms for the extraction, transformation and loading of large volumes of realtime, unstructured data to deploy AI/ML solutions from theoretical data science models.
Run experiments to test the performance of deployed models, and identifies and resolves bugs that arise in the process.
Work in a team setting and apply knowledge in statistics, scripting and programming languages required by the firm.
Work with the relevant software platforms in which the models are deployed.


Qualifications


Work experience in a university, industry, or government lab(s), in a role with primary emphasis on AI research.
Minimum 3 years of work experience in related fields.
In-depth research in a certain field of multimedia and computer vision, including but not limited to: image search, image/video classification and recognition, image segmentation, object detection, OCR, graph neural networks, multimodal, unsupervised and self-supervised learning, etc.
Familiar with the training and deployment of one or more framework models of TensorFlow/PyTorch/MXNet, and understand training acceleration methods such as hybrid precision training and distributed training.
Familiar with the latest research and technical progress of model compression acceleration, including but not limited to model quantization, pruning, knowledge distillation, etc., and inference frameworks such as TensorRT.


Preferred Qualifications


Strong practical ability, winners in Kaggle, COCO, ImageNet, ActivityNet, ICPC, NOI/IOI and other competitions are preferred.
Understand AutoML related algorithms, network structure or super parameter automatic search experience is preferred.
Familiar with big data related frameworks and application of MR/Spark is preferred.
Strong practical ability, papers published in relevant competitions and top academic conferences (such as CVPR, ICCV, ECCV, etc.) are preferred.


TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

title: Data Scientist
description:
[What the role is]

The Data Scientist role is to collaborate with the existing team of data scientists, data engineers, analysts and internal stakeholders to bring scientific, mathematical rigour and enhance statistical methods to identify opportunities that will drive new business initiatives and growth. Working with cross-functional teams within Technology Transformation Group (TTG), agency partners and external vendors, the person is expected to also implement, integrate and deploy developed algorithms / models from development to production into the current analytics system to avail deeper insights into our visitors to drive STB's strategic objectives and growth for Singapore’s tourism industry.

[What you will be working on]

Main Responsibilities


Project Management
Project manage and work closely with vendors and internal stakeholders to deliver on data science related implementations ensuring that deliverables and objectives are met within agreed scope and timelines.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, devops engineers, product managers, and business analysts and business stakeholders, to integrate and deploy models into current analytics platforms and production systems.
Application of Advanced Analytics and Data Science to Support Strategic Business Objectives
Work with large, complex datasets and solve non-routine analysis problems, applying advanced analytical methods as required (e.g., multi-objective optimisation, bayesian optimsation and inference, etc..) to address business use cases and aid in decision making.
Prepare, process, cleanse and verify the integrity of data collected for analysis. Apply data mining techniques, perform statistical analysis and build prototype analysis pipelines iteratively to provide insights at scale.
Apply advanced machine learning techniques and models (e.g., LLMs, Autoencoders, GANs) to create machine learning-based tools or processes (e.g., recommendation engine(s), synthetic data generation, performance tracking through A/B testing, forecasting and predictive capabilities) to improve the current analytics capabilities.
Support and work closely with operational and strategic planning teams through the development of analytical capabilities and tools so that they are able to translate data into actionable insights.
Data Collection and Management
Collaborate with current team to review the existing data collection methods and make improvements to the current data collection strategy.
Enhance data collection procedures to identify and include suitable data for building analytic models relevant for industry transformation.
Analyse and assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources (e.g., datasets received from stakeholders, and annotation/ labelling of new training inputs).
Work with data and agency partners to assemble large, complex datasets that meet functional and non-functional business requirements.
Provide inputs to the design and development of an integrated data model to allow analysis across multiple structured and unstructured datasets.


[What we are looking for]


Degree from a recognised university in a quantitative discipline: Data Science, Applied Mathematics & Statistics or Computer Science.
At least 3-5 years of relevant experience working in developing ML / AI mathematical models and successfully deploying at least 1 medium to large scale ML system.
Proven track record in managing internal and external stakeholders and delivering on objectives according to project timelines.
Good presentation and communication skills with ability to express complex ideas, data / concepts and outcomes of analysis clearly to business audiences.
Strong analytical skills with a good eye for detail and possess an aptitude/experience in solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches.
Ability to integrate and synthesise research and data across multiple sources to derive meaningful conclusions.
Possess extensive working experience solving analytical problems, including skills in statistical data analysis such as linear models, regression, multivariate analysis, stochastic models and sampling methods.
Experience in machine learning techniques (e.g., k-NN, Bayesian Networks, SVM, Decision Forests etc.), machine learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and numerical methods (e.g., multi-objective optimisation, bayesian optimsation etc.)
Experience in using Qliksense and AWS services (e.g., SageMaker, Athena, RDS, ECR, ECS, EMR, Lambda, Redis) will be advantageous.
Experience with DevOps and deploying models through MLOps will be advantageous.
Experience working with structured and unstructured datasets is essential.
Proficient in statistical programming tools (e.g., R, Python), and database languages (e.g., SQL - DQL, DML, DDL)
Good command of written and spoken English
Strong planning, organisational, and time management skills
Show more

description:
Responsibilities

Join us.

About The Team

The team use the most advanced AI technology to combat various risks/violations in TikTok's e-commerce platform, maintain platform security, build a good e-commerce ecosystem, and empower business teams to improve work efficiency. We pursue the ultimate risk detection capability. The fairness and sustainability of the e-commerce ecosystem, high-quality content and merchandise are areas where we are constantly striving for improvement.


Responsible for using algorithms to mine, identify, and predict risks and low-quality merchants, products, and creators in e-commerce scenarios, and assist businesses in managing and controlling them.
Responsible for using algorithms to identify events and behaviors that affect product experience and efficiency, and building data models to help create a favorable ecosystem and support business operations.
Participate in building data for various entities such as e-commerce live streaming/video, products, merchants, and creators, building large-scale network/feature sequence models to support business scenarios such as content understanding, multimodal representation, community mining, and solve problems related to products, live streaming, and video management, and provide support for them.
Participate in building a large-scale graph storage and graph learning platform to improve relationship building and governance within the TikTok e-commerce community.
Explore and research cutting-edge technologies in machine learning/graph learning/sequence learning and related fields, implement these technologies in practical business scenarios, and support the production of scalable and optimised machine learning models.


Qualifications


B. Sc or higher degree in Computer Science or related fields from accredited and reputable institutions.
Solid coding skills, familiar with deep learning/graph neural network/machine learning frameworks such as PyTorch, TensorFlow, DGL, pyg, sklearn, etc.
Familiar with one or more algorithms in machine learning/graph learning/sequence learning, such as graph modeling, timing signal modeling, node/subgraph classification, community mining, representation learning, self-supervised/semi-supervised learning, with a certain depth and breadth.
3+ years of industry experience with solid theoretical foundation of machine learning.


Preferred Qualifications


Familiar with the application of related algorithms in data mining, search recommendation, content understanding, and governance risk control preferred.
Skilled in numpy and pandas for modeling experiments, familiar with big data tools such as Hive, Spark, Hadoop preferred.

title: Research Engineer / Senior Research Engineer, ALI, I2R
description:
Job Description

We are looking for a strong candidate with strong AI background and experiences in audio, speech AI training for industrial projects on audio & speech recognitions.

Key Responsibilities: Work on audio processing, data preparation and multiple model training of multi-language code-switch ASR for projects.

JOB REQUIREMENT


Has a related B.S degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering.
Experiences in speech signal processing, speech recognition, in both hybrid models, supervised E2E models, LLMs fine-tuned models and deep learning
Strong in the following programming languages: Python, Pytorch, C/C++, Linux Bash/Shell
Knowledge in web-based and app developments for demo systems is advantageous

title: Generative AI Lead, Google Cloud Consulting - Singapore
description:
PRODUCT AREA

Google Cloud accelerates every organization's ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google's cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.

Job Description

The Google Cloud Platform team helps customers transform and build what's next for their business - all with technology built in the cloud. Our products are developed for security, reliability and scalability, running the full stack from infrastructure to applications to devices and hardware. Our teams are dedicated to helping our customers - developers, small and large businesses, educational institutions and government agencies - see the benefits of our technology come to life. As part of an entrepreneurial team in this rapidly growing business, you will play a key role in understanding the needs of our customers and help shape the future of businesses of all sizes use technology to connect with customers, employees and partners.

Additional Job Description

As a Generative AI Lead, you will work closely with a regional technical team of field engineers. You will work with the AI Practice Lead to accommodate the demand for Generative AI skills, provide technical leadership across the region, and mentor a growing team. You'll work in small, highly-performing AI teams and bring your demonstrated technical and leadership acumen to a team responsible for ensuring the best experience for customers moving to Google Cloud. You will be responsible for providing technical solutions, managing relationships with our customers' technical staff, and working with our Google Cloud partners. More than just providing excellent support to our partners and customers, you will identify hard problems and develop permanent, elegant solutions.

Qualifications

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES


Consult with customers on technical issues based on in-depth product and technical knowledge of Generative AI.
Develop technical tools and assets. Document reproducible solutions for customers and partners.
Provide technical leadership to a team of Strategic Cloud Engineers and Technical Consultants.
Provide highly technical implementation support in customer environments, including guidance on implementation feasibility of cross-product integrations.
Travel up to 30% of the time.


Minimum Qualifications


Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or equivalent practical experience.
7 years of experience in technical project management, stakeholder management, professional services, solution engineering, or technical consulting, and 1 year of experience in technical leadership.
2 years of experience in people management.
Experience in Artificial Intelligence applications (e.g., deep learning, natural language processing, computer vision, or pattern recognition), applied machine learning techniques, or using OSS frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Experience building ML solutions and developing applications using AI frameworks.


Preferred Qualifications


MBA or Master's degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, a related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience building with Generative AI tools and techniques to solve business problems in particular conversational workloads.
Experience with contact center technologies and platforms and building conversational applications.

title: AI Research Scientist - Digital Business Services
description:
Some careers grow faster than others.

If you're looking for a career that will give you plenty of opportunities to develop, join HSBC and your future will be rich with potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.

HSBC Digital Business Services is a pivotal part of the Group, providing essential operational and technical support to our global businesses and helping improve customer service and efficiency. Digital Business Services combines global expertise and technology to help keep us ahead of the competition.

We are currently seeking a high calibre professional to join our team as an AI Research Scientist.

Principal Responsibilities

As a seasoned AI Research Scientist, you'll assume a key role within our team, spearheading expansive AI research endeavors with a specialized focus on cutting-edge AI/LLM concepts. Your wealth of expertise will be pivotal in elevating our existing tools and pioneering achievements, particularly within the realm of Language Model techniques. Delivering into the ethical nuances of AI, you'll ensure our innovations are upheld to the highest ethical standards. Collaborating closely with esteemed peers both internally and externally, you'll apply your AI acumen to intricate domains, shaping the formidable capabilities of our organisation and fostering strategic partnerships. Beyond your groundbreaking research contributions, you'll actively engage in knowledge dissemination, mentorship, and leadership, solidifying your esteemed position within our team. This role presents an unparalleled opportunity for seasoned professional to drive innovation and leave an incredible mark on the technological frontier within HSBC.

In this role, you will:

Lead pioneering research endeavours, driving development of cutting-edge AI/LLM concepts, tools and algorithms
Architect and refine AI models with precision, optimizing for peak performance, seamless scalability, and operational efficacy
Design and orchestrate comprehensive experiments to meticulously evaluate and juxtapose the performance of diverse AI models and methodologies
Forge strategic alliances with academic and industry luminaries, collaborating to solve AI problems and craft bespoke AI solutions tailored to intricate domain challenges
Utilize and develop advanced algorithms for processing and analysing complex datasets
Cultivate an intellectual ecosystem, staying at the forefront of AI innovation through active engagement in premier conferences and workshops





Qualifications


Extensive understanding of fundamentals of deep learning and AI algorithms including deep nonlinear and nonconvex optimization, and generally a mathematical command of advanced AI concepts
Extensive understanding of calculus of manifolds and its applied on AI algorithms such as SGD, subgradient methods, transformer architectures, random matrix theory, compression techniques, to name a few
Theoretical understanding and practical experience with CNNs, RNNs, transformers, GNNs, PINNs, equivariant neural networks, and generally core deep learning principles
Track record of publishing papers in top-tier AI conferences and journal such as NeurIPS, AAAI, ICML, ICLR
Demonstrate proficiency in the intricacies of self-attention/transformer architectures and their contemporary refinements, including nuanced fine-tuning techniques like LoRA, as well as techniques like RAG and its variants
Strong insight into the multifaceted challenges inherent in AI algorithms encompassing intricate domains such as valleys of local minima, convergence properties, interpretability and explainability, and output evaluation
Commanding expertise in programming languages and frameworks intrinsic to AI development, including, PyTorch as well nonlinear nonconvex optimization libraries. Julia and MATLAB experience is a plus
Demonstrated ability to independently drive research projects from inception to completion with the required mathematical rigor

The chosen candidate for this role will be required to undergo enhanced vetting. Subject to local laws, this will require the individual to satisfactorily pass a series of additional checks as part of the recruitment process and on an ongoing basis, if appointed to the role. HSBC Group reserves its position with regards to any steps which it may take in relation to any material adverse findings which arise either when the checks are originally completed, and/or if relevant, on an ongoing basis.

You'll achieve more when you join HSBC.
www.hsbc.com/careers

HSBC is committed to building a culture where all employees are valued, respected and opinions count. We take pride in providing a workplace that fosters continuous professional development, flexible working and opportunities to grow within an inclusive and diverse environment. Personal data held by the Bank relating to employment applications will be used in accordance with our Privacy Statement, which is available on our website.

Issued by The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited.

title: Research Fellow (Computer Science & Engineering/Electronic Engineering/Applied Mathematics/Perception Sciences)
description:
The College of Computing & Data Science (CCDS) invites applications for the position of Research Fellow.

Key Responsibilities


Responsible for performing quality assessment for 3D digital asset coding and CG rendering.
Submission of a comprehensive reports/IDs/Demos/papers summarizing/justifying the pioneer and innovative research performed
To perform the pioneer research in exploring quality assessment for 3D digital asset coding and CG rendering.
To perform systematic investigation into the said field, to meet the emerging requirements for AI.
To devise new schemes for quality assessment for 3D digital asset coding and/or CG rendering, with datasets and real-world setting under different conditions.
To propose a methodology/framework as IPs to be developed in the project.
To present research findings in a form of reports/papers and present in international peer-reviewed conferences and journals.
To be involved in the mentoring of FYP/Master/PhD student projects.


Job Requirements


Possess a good PhD degree in computer science (and engineering), electronic engineering, applied mathematics, perception sciences, etc.
Have good technical reading, writing and programming skills.
Have good experience and track record for related R&D.
High desire for technological exploration and achievement.
Background knowledge in signal representation/processing, 3D visual data, and data-driven and machine learning/analysis.
Prior research experience and track record in R&D and standardization.
Prior experience in state-of-the-art AI techniques.
Mastering of a programming language would be valued (e.g. Python, C, Matlab, ...)
Self-driven, highly motivated, with interest to work with other researchers and scientists (as a team player) to produce high-quality research.


We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Hiring Institution: NTU
